name: Elemental Balls (2014 Fan Project)
description:
Before working with Jesulink on our big game "Kofi Quest: Alpha Mod" (https://store.steampowered.com/app/705340/Kofi_Quest_Alpha_MOD/) we started making some fan games around his universe "5 elementos". This is one of them.

(I lost the latest build so I only have what I recovered plus half a day of work fixing and rebuilding it)

You'll need this for the HTML version -> https://www.gameload.top/
